name: 100% Roasted Arabica Coffee Beans (Pack of 2)
description:
• 100% ARABICA COFFEE:100% Raw and Unprocessed coming from Organically cultivated farms carefully prepared to preserve all Vital Ingredients
  • PROMOTES WELLNESS: They are a Rich source of antioxidants which improve blood circulation and even moisturizes, smoothens, nourishes and tones the skin
  • IMPROVES IMMUNITY: Contains essential nutrients like Riboflavin, Pantothenic Acid, Manganese, Potassium, Magnesium and Niacin which boost Immunity and improve Metabolism
  • TASTE: They have a pleasant taste, a delicate flavor and a balanced aroma
  • ORIGIN: Sourced directly from Baarbara Estates (4500-5000ft Elevation) in Chikmagalur, Karnataka. The birthplace of Indian Coffee
  • PACKAGE CONTENT: 2 packs of Baarbara Roasted Arabica Coffee Beans; Quantity: 2*250 gms
